block/OTG.description: USB OTG core by Synopsys (more docs at <https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/programmable/hps/agilex5/index_frames.html>)

items.name: DIEPTXF0
items.description: Endpoint 0 transmit FIFO size register (device mode)

items.name: HNPTXFSIZ
items.description: Non-periodic transmit FIFO size register (host mode)

items.name: HNPTXSTS
items.description: Non-periodic transmit FIFO/queue status register (host mode)

items.name: GCCFG_V1
items.description: General core configuration register, for core_id 0x0000_1xxx

items.name: GCCFG_V2
items.description: General core configuration register, for core_id 0x0000_[23]xxx

items.name: GCCFG_V3
items.description: General core configuration register, for core_id 0x0000_5xxx

items.name: HPTXFSIZ
items.description: Host periodic transmit FIFO size register

items.name: DIEPTXF
items.description: Device IN endpoint transmit FIFO size register

items.name: HFNUM
items.description: Host frame number/frame time remaining register

items.name: HAINTMSK
items.description: Host all channels interrupt mask register

items.name: HPRT
items.description: Host port control and status register

items.name: HCDMA
items.description: Host channel DMA address register (config for scatter/gather)

items.name: HCDMAB
items.description: Host channel DMA address register (address for current transfer; debug)

items.name: DIEPMSK
items.description: Device IN endpoint common interrupt mask register

items.name: DOEPMSK
items.description: Device OUT endpoint common interrupt mask register

items.name: DIEPEMPMSK
items.description: Device IN endpoint FIFO empty interrupt mask register

items.name: DIEPTSIZ
items.description: Device IN endpoint transfer size register

items.name: DTXFSTS
items.description: Device IN endpoint transmit FIFO status register

items.name: DOEPTSIZ
items.description: Device OUT endpoint transfer size register

items.name: DOEPDMA
items.description: Device OUT/IN endpoint DMA address register

items.name: PCGCCTL
items.description: Power and clock gating control register

items.name: FIFO
items.description: Device endpoint / host channel FIFO register

fieldset/DIEPEMPMSK.description: Device IN endpoint FIFO empty interrupt mask register

fields.name: INEPTXFEM
fields.description: IN EP Tx FIFO empty interrupt mask bits

fieldset/DIEPMSK.description: Device IN endpoint common interrupt mask register

fields.name: ITTXFEMSK
fields.description: IN token received when TxFIFO empty mask

fields.name: INEPNMM
fields.description: IN token received with EP mismatch mask

fieldset/DOEPMSK.description: Device OUT endpoint common interrupt mask register

fields.name: OTEPDM
fields.description: OUT token received when endpoint disabled mask

fieldset/DOEPTSIZ.description: Device OUT endpoint transfer size register

fields.name: FNSOF
fields.description: Frame number of the received SOF

fieldset/DTXFSTS.description: Device IN endpoint transmit FIFO status register

fields.name: CHGDET
fields.description: Charger detection, result of the current mode (primary or secondary).

fields.name: FSVPLUS
fields.description: Single-Ended DP indicator This bit gives the voltage level on DP (also result of the comparison with V<sub>LGC</sub> threshold as defined in BC v1.2 standard).

fields.name: FSVMINUS
fields.description: Single-Ended DM indicator This bit gives the voltage level on DM (also result of the comparison with V<sub>LGC</sub> threshold as defined in BC v1.2 standard).

fields.name: SESSVLD
fields.description: VBUS session indicator Indicates if VBUS is above VBUS session threshold.

fields.name: HCDPDETEN
fields.description: Host CDP port voltage detector enable on DP.

fields.name: HVDMSRCEN
fields.description: Host CDP port Voltage source enable on DM.

fields.name: VBDEN
fields.description: VBUS detection enable Enables VBUS Sensing Comparators in order to detect VBUS presence and/or perform OTG operation.

fields.name: VBVALOVAL
fields.description: Software override value of the VBUS B-session detection.

fields.name: VBVALOVEN
fields.description: Enables a software override of the VBUS B-session detection.

fields.name: FORCEHOSTPD
fields.description: Force host mode pull-downs If the ID pin functions are enabled, the host mode pull-downs on DP and DM activate automatically. However, whenever that is not the case, yet host mode is required, this bit must be used to force the pull-downs active.

fields.name: GINAKEFFM
fields.description: Global non-periodic IN NAK effective mask

fields.name: ISOODRPM
fields.description: Isochronous OUT packet dropped interrupt mask

fields.name: EOPFM
fields.description: End of periodic frame interrupt mask

fields.name: IPXFRM_IISOOXFRM
fields.description: Incomplete periodic transfer mask (host mode) / Incomplete isochronous OUT transfer mask (device mode)

fields.name: SRQIM
fields.description: Session request/new session detected interrupt mask

fields.name: IPXFR_INCOMPISOOUT
fields.description: Incomplete periodic transfer (host mode) / Incomplete isochronous OUT transfer (device mode)

fields.name: DMAREQ
fields.description: DMA request signal enabled for USB OTG HS

fields.name: EPNUM
fields.description: Endpoint number (device mode) / Channel number (host mode)

fieldset/HAINTMSK.description: Host all channels interrupt mask register

fields.name: ODDFRM
fields.description: Odd frame (request iso/interrupt transaction to be performed on odd micro-frame)

fields.name: NTDL
fields.description: NTD descriptor list length for isochronuous & interrupt pipes (xfrsiz[15:8], note val+1 is actual length)

fields.name: SCHEDINFO
fields.description: Schedule info for isochronuous & interrupt pipes (xfrsiz[7:0])

fieldset/HFNUM.description: Host frame number/frame time remaining register

fields.name: NPTQXSAV
fields.description: Non-periodic transmit request queue space available

fields.name: NPTXQTOP
fields.description: Top of the non-periodic transmit request queue

fieldset/HPRT.description: Host port control and status register

fields.name: PTXFSAVL
fields.description: Periodic transmit data FIFO space available

fields.name: PTXQSAV
fields.description: Periodic transmit request queue space available

fields.name: PTXQTOP
fields.description: Top of the periodic transmit request queue

fieldset/PCGCCTL.description: Power and clock gating control register

variants.name: FULL_SPEED_EXTERNAL
variants.description: Full speed using external ULPI PHY

variants.name: FULL_SPEED_INTERNAL
variants.description: Full speed using internal embedded PHY
